SEARCH
Package me.squidxtv.frameui.core

Interface ScreenSpawner

All Known Implementing Classes:
PacketScreenSpawner
public interface ScreenSpawner
The ScreenSpawner is responsible for spawning and despawning Screen instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    despawn(Screen screen)
    Despawns the given Screen for its current viewers.
    void
    despawn(Screen screen, Collection<Player> viewers)
    Despawns the given Screen for the specified players.
    default void
    despawn(Screen screen, Player viewer)
    Despawns the given Screen for a single player.
    default void
    spawn(Screen screen)
    Spawns the given Screen for its current viewers.
    void
    spawn(Screen screen, Collection<Player> viewers)
    Spawns the given Screen for the specified players.
    default void
    spawn(Screen screen, Player viewer)
    Spawns the given Screen for a single player.
    void
    update(Screen screen)
    Updates the display of the given Screen.

  • Method Details

    • spawn

      void spawn(Screen screen, Collection<Player> viewers)
      Spawns the given Screen for the specified players.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be spawned
      viewers - the collection of players to spawn the screen for

    • despawn

      void despawn(Screen screen, Collection<Player> viewers)
      Despawns the given Screen for the specified players.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be despawned
      viewers - the collection of players to despawn the screen for

    • update

      void update(Screen screen)
      Updates the display of the given Screen. Used for reflecting the pixel changes to the viewers by sending information with packets or similar.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be updated

    • spawn

      default void spawn(Screen screen)
      Spawns the given Screen for its current viewers.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be spawned

    • despawn

      default void despawn(Screen screen)
      Despawns the given Screen for its current viewers.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be despawned

    • spawn

      default void spawn(Screen screen, Player viewer)
      Spawns the given Screen for a single player.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be spawned
      viewer - the player to spawn the screen for

    • despawn

      default void despawn(Screen screen, Player viewer)
      Despawns the given Screen for a single player.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to be despawned
      viewer - the player to despawn the screen for
